content: Future is here > Serverless news @ re:Invent : 1. Toolkits for IDEs and Custom Runtimes - 2. Lambda layers (extend!) - 3. Nested apps (reuse!) - 4. Step functions service integrations - 5. Websocket support for API GW - 6. ALB support for Lambda (integrate!) #reinvent2018 https://t.co/OMd2mDFedQ
